title: Replace placeholder Vanguard logo with uploaded tsgabrielle brand logos for light and dark backgrounds

requirements.text: Replace the placeholder 'Vanguard' text logo in the Layout component header with the uploaded tsgabrielle logo, using the purple version (tsgabrielle-logo (1).png) for light backgrounds and the white version (tsgabrielle-logo-white.png) for dark backgrounds, with appropriate theme-based switching

quotes: logo in light and dark background

acceptanceCriteria: The header displays the purple tsgabrielle logo when in light mode
The header displays the white tsgabrielle logo when in dark mode
The logo maintains appropriate dimensions and does not distort
The logo is clickable and navigates to the homepage
The 'Vanguard' text is completely replaced with the logo image

requirements.text: Update all references to 'Vanguard' branding throughout the application to use 'TS Gabrielle' as the brand name, including page titles, meta tags, and any text content that references the brand
acceptanceCriteria: All instances of 'Vanguard' in UI text are replaced with 'TS Gabrielle'
HTML title and meta tags reflect the TS Gabrielle brand name
Footer and any other branded text areas use the correct brand name

constraints: Do not modify the Layout component structure beyond logo replacement
Preserve existing navigation functionality and mobile menu behavior
Maintain responsive design for logo display across all screen sizes
nonGoals: Altering any other components besides logo display
